name: Lakehouse
description:
Spend a year at Stowford!

It's 2004, you're moving away to study at Stowford College, and you're determined not to be single by the summer holidays!

You wave off your parents, catch the next train, and make your way to Stowford College to find love... and also study or something.

Enjoy a choices matter visual novel built to be all killer, no filler.

LAKEHOUSE Features:

  • 4 unique Routes with their own engaging themes, making for hours of content.
  • 42+ unlock CGs that vary from fun character moments to motivational posters.
  • 23+ music tracks that ooze personality.
  • Numerous Steam achievements combined with hidden content will ensure bragging rights among friends if you unlock them first.
  • It's a VN optimised for resolutions above 720p, for the classy enthusiast.

Join a Club!

The Photography Club - Try out Stowford's most popular club, led by Stowford's most popular student, Kelly Brooks! By using state of the art equipment, anyone can make a statement!

Kelly has insisted we be note that access to the Dark Room is restricted, to ensure that negatives can properly develop.

The Stowford Otters - For the athletically inclined, the Stowford Otters are a dream team. Build confidence and practice your technique in our on-site pool!

Interested students should contact Craig Davis as soon as possible, to reserve a slot.

The Games Club - If you're a fan of video gaming, card games, or board games, you could do worse than the Games Club.

As with all clubs at Stowford College, the Games Club is obligated to offer a taster session to new students at the start of each school year.

The Events Committee - Please disregard, Justin Moore of the Events Committee has been asked to step down following the 'exploding urinal' incident and will no longer be allowed to participate in club activites.
